title: Frazier to appear on MLB Network for NLCS
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Reds 3B Todd Frazier to appear on MLB Network for NLCS Todd Frazier will serve as an analyst on MLB Network’s postgame coverage of Game 1 of the NLCS on Saturday. Post to Facebook Reds 3B Todd Frazier to appear on MLB Network for NLCS Todd Frazier will serve as an analyst on MLB Network’s postgame coverage of Game 1 of the NLCS on Saturday. Check out this story on cincinnati.com: http://cin.ci/1Ly3mCZ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 2 Reds Blog C. Trent Rosecrans , crosecrans@enquirer.com 1:35 p.m. EDT October 16, 2015 
Cincinnati Reds third baseman Todd Frazier (21) smiles after hitting a deep fly ball into right field, just short of a home run, in the third inning during the MLB game between the Cincinnati Reds and St. Louis Cardinals, Thursday, Sept. 10, 2015, at Great American Ball Park in Cincinnati. (Photo: The Enquirer/Kareem Elgazzar) 
Todd Frazier will serve as an analyst on MLB Network’s postgame coverage of Game 1 of the National League Championship Series on Saturday. 
The Reds third baseman will join Hall of Fame pitcher John Smoltz and host Paul Sverino following the game between the Cubs and Mets. 
It will be Frazier’s third time serving as a guest analyst on MLB Network during the postseason. Read or Share this story: http://cin.ci/1Ly3mCZ Most Popular
